screenId.description: The list of screen IDs. To include multiple screen IDs, provide an ampersand-separated list. For example, `screenId=10000&screenId=10001`.

tabId.description: The list of tab IDs. To include multiple tab IDs, provide an ampersand-separated list. For example, `tabId=10000&tabId=10001`.

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResult.description: The maximum number of items to return per page. The maximum number is 100,
